maven-less-compiler-plugin

less-compiler:compile

Full name:

com.kalixia.maven.plugins:maven-less-compiler-plugin:0.0.1:compile

Description:

(no description)

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: generate-resources.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
includes PatternSet - A set of file patterns to include LESS files
outputDirectory File - (no description)
webappSourceDirectory File - (no description)

Parameter Details

includes:

A set of file patterns to include LESS files
  • Type: org.apache.maven.model.PatternSet
  • Required: No

outputDirectory:

(no description)
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${project.build.directory}/${project.build.finalName}

webappSourceDirectory:

(no description)
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${basedir}/src/main/webapp
